page.title: 16Buildings in Garway
page.content: Altogether we identified 92 inhabited houses within our 12 square kilometre block. We received 59 replies to our questionnaire, and one outright refusal. Of these 59 buildings, only 3 were erected within the last five years. 8 were between 5 and 20 years old, and 13 others (mostly 'Fairview', the council houses) were built this century. The majority, 35, date from at least the last century, and in some cases very much earlier. 40 people were able to set a date, exact or approximate, to their houses. In cases where more than one date was provided (e.g. because of extensions) we have taken the earlier. One house is claimed as 14th century in origin, one 16th century, three 17th century, one 18th century and thirteen 19th century.
